attributes.additional_details:
Emergency services and armed forces in the UK must buy fuel from petrol stations at current prices. This is putting a huge strain on budgets. We the undersigned petition the Government to force Oil companies selling fuel in the UK to offer the fuel to the Armed forces and emergency services either free of charge or at a significant discount.
These services provide international protection of its employees (such as the evacuation of oil workers from libya by the RAF) or domestic services such as fire protection and prosecution of petrol thieves.
